title: issue: When using react-hook-form's useFieldArray, reset errors when called from react-navigation's onPress
body:
### Version Number

7.18.0

### Codesandbox/Expo snack

https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-reset-usefieldarray-forked-yk7g4?file=/src/index.js

### Steps to reproduce

Thanks for the library. Since this issue involves using react-hook-form with react-navigation, I'm not entirely sure where the problem is. But since the error is produced by react-hook-form, I thought it might worth creating an issue here.

1. Go to [CodeSandbox](https://codesandbox.io/s/react-hook-form-reset-usefieldarray-forked-yk7g4?file=/src/index.js)
2. Click on 'Append'
3. Click on 'Back'
4. See error

Note: this sandbox is based on the field array example from [here](https://react-hook-form.com/api/usefieldarray). If you click on 'RESET' instead of 'Back', the form works as expected.

### Expected behaviour

Field array should be reset to an empty array when "Back" is clicked, just like clicking on "RESET" does.

### What browsers are you seeing the problem on?

Chrome

### Relevant log output

```shell
TypeError
Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'id')
eval
https://yk7g4.csb.app/node_modules/react-hook-form/dist/index.cjs.js:1:5182
X
https://yk7g4.csb.app/node_modules/react-hook-form/dist/index.cjs.js:1:5143
Object.callback [as next]
https://yk7g4.csb.app/node_modules/react-hook-form/dist/index.cjs.js:1:21597
Object.next
https://yk7g4.csb.app/node_modules/react-hook-form/dist/index.cjs.js:1:6002
reset
https://yk7g4.csb.app/node_modules/react-hook-form/dist/index.cjs.js:1:19817
onPress
/src/index.js:33:22
```
